text: Rainham railway station is a railway station in Rainham in Kent. The station is in walking distance from the Rainham shopping centre. The station is on the Chatham Main Line. ==Services== Train services at Rainham are run by Southeastern and Thameslink, They use , and EMUs. The off-peak service is: * 2 trains per hour to London St Pancras International * 2 trains per hour to * 2 trains per hour to via and * 1 trains per hour to * 1 trains per hour to via * 2 trains per hour to Some trains go to and from and London Cannon Street at peak hours. ==References== Category:Railway stations in Medway
title: Rainham railway station (Kent)
